description: Smaller of pair of twin primes whose average is LCM[1,...,m] for some m.
formula: If z=A051451(n), then {z-1, z+1} are twin primes.
example: (419+421)/2=420=LCM[1,2,3,4,5,6,7] No more such primes occurs below m<2000. Known values of m such that LCM[1,..,m] is a twin prime mean value are as follows: {3,4,5,6,7,19,20,21,22,47,48}.
author: _Labos Elemer_, Nov 08 2000
